sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app-bar>
    <template v-slot:prepend>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon
        @click="openNavbar"
        :icon="drawerIcon ? 'mdi-star' : 'mdi-account'"
      ></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
    </template>
    <v-app-bar-title>todo</v-app-bar-title>
    <v-divider vertical></v-divider>
    <template v-slot:append>
      <v-btn
        color="green"
        variant="outlined"
        append-icon="mdi-login"
        class="ml-3 mr-2"
      >
        Login
      </v-btn>
    </template>
  </v-app-bar>
  <NavigationComponent ref="NavigationDrawer"></NavigationComponent>
</template>
<script>
import NavigationComponent from "@/components/NavigationDrawer.vue";

export default {
  name: "HeaderComponent",
  components: {
    NavigationComponent,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      drawerIcon: false,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    openNavbar() {
      this.drawerIcon = !this.drawerIcon;
      this.$refs.NavigationDrawer.openNavbar();
    },
  },
};
</script>
<style></style>
